title: Spicy Cajun Sweet Potato Mash
directions: Peel the sweet potato and chop into small chunks.
Using a steamer pan, add water to the bottom pan and set to medium-high heat until bubbling.
Place the chopped sweet potato into the top steamer pan, place lid on top and steam until softened. This will take approximately 20 minutes.
Remove the sweet potato and place into a bowl.
Add the spices to the bowl and mash, combining all the ingredients.
Serve with dinner (we recommend this Delicious Crockpot Pulled Pork Recipe).
